sunscreens.overview: A hydrating mineral sunscreen that provides broad-spectrum SPF 30 protection while nourishing the skin with essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid. Perfect for daily use on face and body.
sunscreens.ingredients: Zinc Oxide 21.6%, Titanium Dioxide 1.8%, Water, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Propanediol, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Niacinamide, Dimethiconol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ceramide EOP
sunscreens.howTo:
Apply generous amount (1/4 teaspoon) to face and neck
Apply 15 minutes before sun exposure
Reapply every 2 hours or after sweating
sunscreens.whyEffective: Zinc oxide and titanium dioxide provide broad-spectrum protection while ceramides and hyaluronic acid hydrate skin.

sunscreens.productName: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen SPF 70
sunscreens.overview: A high-protection sunscreen with SPF 70 that provides superior broad-spectrum protection with a lightweight, non-greasy dry-touch finish. Water-resistant and fast-absorbing.
sunscreens.ingredients: Avobenzone 3%, Homosalate 15%, Octisalate 5%, Octocrylene 7%, Water, Silica, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Zinc Oxide, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Beeswax, Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer, Dimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Jojoba Esters, Methylisothiazolinone, Phenoxyethanol, Polyaminopropyl Biguanide, Sodium Polyacrylate, Triethanolamine, Xanthan Gum
sunscreens.howTo:
Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure
Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating
Reapply at least every 2 hours
sunscreens.whyEffective: SPF 70 broad spectrum protection with Helioplex technology provides stable defense against UVA/UVB rays. Lightweight, oil-free formula with dry-touch finish.

sunscreens.productName: The Ordinary Mineral UV Filters SPF 30
sunscreens.overview: An affordable mineral sunscreen with zinc oxide and titanium dioxide that provides broad-spectrum SPF 30 protection. Lightweight formula suitable for sensitive and acne-prone skin.
sunscreens.ingredients: Zinc Oxide 12%, Titanium Dioxide 3.2%, Aqua (Water), C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Triheptanoin, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Silica, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol
sunscreens.howTo:
Apply generous amount as final step in AM routine
Reapply every 2 hours or after swimming/sweating
Use on face and body as needed
sunscreens.whyEffective: Mineral sunscreen with zinc oxide and titanium dioxide provides broad-spectrum protection. Lightweight formula suitable for sensitive skin without chemical filters.

sunscreens.overview: A dual-purpose moisturizer and sunscreen designed specifically for acne-prone skin. Provides broad-spectrum SPF 30 protection while hydrating without clogging pores.
sunscreens.ingredients: Avobenzone 2%, Octisalate 4.5%, Octocrylene 6%, Water, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Silica, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, BHT
sunscreens.howTo:
Apply to clean face and neck every morning
Use as final step in skincare routine
Reapply throughout day as needed for sun protection
sunscreens.whyEffective: Dual-action formula provides broad-spectrum SPF 30 protection while moisturizing acne-prone skin. Oil-free, non-comedogenic formula won't clog pores.
